vision_analysis.question_text: Which of the following describes your preference for natural gas?
clickable_elements: I prefer natural gas over electricity
I prefer electricity over natural gas

automation.question_text:
Which of the following describes your preference for natural gas?
Note: For this question and the remainder of the survey when we refer to electricity we are referring to electricity from the grid, we are not referring to solar power and batteries, unless specified in the question.
automation.response_value: I prefer natural gas over electricity
response_values: I prefer natural gas over electricity
